channel.title: Lua on Sam Taylor
channel.description: Recent content in Lua on Sam Taylor

item.title: Bitcoin IRC sentiment analysis
item.description: I wrote a Lua bot to sit and monitor the IRC channels listed here (minus the tickers) for uses of the ‘sentiment words’ listed here. Obviously this has no chance of giving meaningful results but it was a fun project. Click for the graph of bitcoin price vs. bitcoin sentiment on IRC. https://github.com/darkFunction/BitcoinIRCSentiment
